## Description {#details}

This is the interface to build a ModuleSummaryIndex for a module.

<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Returns true if the instruction could have memprof metadata, used to ensure</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="comment">/// consistency between summary analysis and the ThinLTO backend processing.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af619a00e1ea9b169197b2d7ce9798aa6"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af619a00e1ea9b169197b2d7ce9798aa6">mayHaveMemprofSummary</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &#42;CB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
